system.availability: Useful for bringing back a target dead or alive. Tracking them to places few humans would go. Such as hunting a human who fled to wilderness space, an alien of note, or so on. To determine success roll 1d5 + DoS on Requisition Test. If this amount is more than Influence Bonus or Threat Rating of target, succeed. Modify test based on target and requirements.
system.cost: Kroot Trackers, Eldar Rangers, and so on make for excellent Bounty hunters given the right price.
